title: RAIN
description: Sleeping Beauty in a post-apocalyptic landâ€¦  In a world gone mad, where little remains but a vast wasteland of sand, the leader of a troop of roving warriors welcomes a brave young woman into his midst.  Much as he burns for her, Major Clay Worthington swears to keep his distance from the mysterious woman, so sensitive even the stinging rain can wound her.  Rosina Brierly is besotted with the formidable soldier and will gladly trade her life for one torrid night of blissful passion in his arms.  But when sleep overcomes them, will true love prevail?
author: Taryn Kincaid
